query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `search_history` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `user_id` int NOT NULL,
  `query` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `filters` text,
  `result_count` int,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `search_history_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

-- Add fulltext index for candidates table if not exists
ALTER TABLE candidates ADD FULLTEXT INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_candidates_fulltext` (fullName, email, skills, education);
